Please refer AUGSD Website for seating arrangements. The test details are

for giving the DSA Quiz dexam.

1.=C2=A0 =C2=A0 =C2=A0The exam is open book (but not open Internet). At any=
 point in

DC.

oad the

with your mobile, name the file with your BITS ID, and upload it on mettl.

vity and

of Mettl; it would go by the physical clock. I would send announcements
periodically on mettl. Please understand that this decision is taken so
that sincere student is not penalized. There would be a penalty for each
minute for a late submission.
